name: 1916 Der Unbekannte Krieg (NOT MY GAME READ DESC.)
name_original: 1916 Der Unbekannte Krieg (NOT MY GAME READ DESC.)
description:
(THIS IS NOT MY GAME I JUST WANT IT TO BE EASIER TO ACCESS)

The plot follows a young German soldier in the trenches during World War 1. He is the only one left and tries to escape the maze of trenches while trying to find the next ladder. However, aside from the dangers of enemy soldiers outside of the trench and mustard gas there are also dinosaurs roaming the trench.
